name: workout-challenge
description: workout_challenge is a self-hosted app for defining and tracking fitness challenges over time. It provides simple dashboards and progress views that help individuals or small groups stay accountable.
features: Challenge creation: Define fitness challenges with specific goals, duration, and completion criteria.
Progress tracking: Log daily or weekly progress toward challenge goals with simple data entry.
Dashboard view: See current challenges, completion status, and upcoming milestones at a glance.
Group challenges: Create shared challenges for friends or family to participate in together.
Leaderboards: Compare progress with other participants to add friendly competition and motivation.
Goal types: Support various challenge formats including step counts, workout frequency, or distance targets.
Streak tracking: Monitor consecutive days of progress to build consistent fitness habits.
Completion badges: Earn virtual badges and achievements when completing challenges or reaching milestones.
Historical data: Review past challenges and performance to see long-term fitness improvements.
Reminder notifications: Set up reminders to log progress and stay on track with challenge commitments.
Custom metrics: Define your own challenge metrics beyond the default options for personalized goals.
Privacy controls: Choose whether challenges are private, shared with specific users, or publicly visible.
